title: Avocado Sourdough Toast with Feta
directions: Cut the avocado in two lengthways and scoop the flesh out into a bowl
Season to your liking with salt and pepper and add a few drops of lemon juice
Mash the ingredients together in a bowl
Pop the sourdough bread into your toaster and toast until nicely golden
Spread mashed avocado on the toast
Garnish with feta cheese or ham hock
Top tip: For a fiery twist on this recipe, try adding fresh red chilli too!
ingredients: feta cheese or ham hock to garnish
